question_template: %s, player-coach A1 is charged with a technical foul for %s. The foul counts towards the team foul penalty in the following period
template_substitutions: Between the first and second half
Between the third period and the fourth period
Shortly before the jump ball for the beginning of the game
explanation: I36-3 During an interval of play a technical foul is committed by a team member who is entitled to play and who is designated as player-coach. The technical foul shall count as a player foul and shall count towards the team foul penalty situation in the following period.
